tasks.label: Kotlin: Watch and Log Diagnostics
args: & { Set-Location 'android'; if (-not (Test-Path '..\kotlin_diagnostics')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory '..\kotlin_diagnostics' | Out-Null }; .\gradlew.bat assembleDebug --continuous --warning-mode all 2>&1 | Tee-Object -FilePath '..\kotlin_diagnostics\gradle.log' }
